channel.title: Errors in Compile.bat and runserver.bat
channel.description:
My compile and runserver both have an X over them why is that?
I get this error in compile .bat
error: cannot read: *.java 1 error Exeption in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
-------------------------
and this error in runserver.bat
Exeption in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
-----------------------------------------
This is what they have in them
Compile.bat -
@echo off title yourservernamehere "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause
-------------
runserver.bat -
@echo off title yourservernamehere java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
--------------------------------
Please help, thankyou.

item.title: Errors in Compile.bat and runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @L_O_L_H_A_X L O L H A X
item.description:
@L_O_L_H_A_X wrote:

My compile and runserver both have an X over them why is that?

I get this error in compile .bat

error: cannot read: *.java
1 error
Exeption in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server

and this error in runserver.bat

Exeption in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server

This is what they have in them

Compile.bat -

@echo off
title yourservernamehere
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

runserver.bat -

@echo off
title yourservernamehere
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Please help, thankyou.

Read full topic
